name: Unholy Demise
description: Have you ever played a wad which was so excellent that it made your mouth drop in sheer astonishment? Most likely not. But today, you certainly will. I have crafted an absolute masterpiece. A masterpiece of not just detail, but excellent gameplay in every sense of the word. You will never be the same after experiencing this finely crafted piece of work. The story, gameplay, and detail truly outdo any wad I have made in the past by 100 fold. This wad replaces Map01 of Doom 2.
